heading: HR02458
0: RESOLUTION CONDEMNING IN THE STRONGEST POSSIBLE TERMS THE ATROCIOUS TERRORISTIC ATTACK IN JOLO, SULU, EXPRESSING SUPPORT TO PRESIDENT RODRIGO ROA DUTERTE IN HIS EFFORTS TO PREVENT OR SUPPRESS LAWLESS VIOLENCE IN MINDANAO, AND EXTENDING ITS DEEPEST CONDOLENCES AND SYMPATHIES TO THE FAMILIES OF THOSE KILLED AND INJURED
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2019-01-30
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02458
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CONDEMNING IN THE STRONGEST POSSIBLE TERMS THE ATROCIOUS TERRORISTIC ATTACK IN JOLO, SULU, EXPRESSING SUPPORT TO PRESIDENT RODRIGO ROA DUTERTE IN HIS EFFORTS TO PREVENT OR SUPPRESS LAWLESS VIOLENCE IN MINDANAO, AND EXTENDING ITS DEEPEST CONDOLENCES AND SYMPATHIES TO THE FAMILIES OF THOSE KILLED AND INJURED
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VARGAS, ALFRED D.
DATE FILED : 2019-01-29
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2019-01-30
